            <item>
                <title><![CDATA[Iranian aggression ‘greatest threat to our world’, says Netanyahu]]></title>
                <link>https://www.irishtimes.com/news/world/middle-east/iranian-aggression-greatest-threat-to-our-world-says-netanyahu-1.3396502?localLinksEnabled=false</link>
                <description><![CDATA[Prime minister claims Israel could act against Tehran as Syrian conflict raises tensions]]></description>
                <dc:creator></dc:creator>
                <dc:subject>Middle East</dc:subject>
                <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3396502</guid>
                <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 14:41:26 +0000</pubDate>
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                        <media:content url="https://www.irishtimes.com/polopoly_fs/1.3396500.1518964879!/image/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_940/image.jpg" medium="image" type="image/jpeg">
                            <media:title>Israeli prime minister Benjamin Netanyahu holds up an object what he claimed was a piece of an Iranian drone shot down in Israeli airspace as he gives a speech during the Munich Security Conference  in Germany. Photograph: AFP/ MSC Munich Security Conference/ Lennart Preiss </media:title>
                        </media:content>
                                                                                </item>
                                                                            

            <item>
                <title><![CDATA[Forget Boston and Berlin: let’s look to Canada for our economic model]]></title>
                <link>https://www.irishtimes.com/business/economy/forget-boston-and-berlin-let-s-look-to-canada-for-our-economic-model-1.3396459?localLinksEnabled=false</link>
                <description><![CDATA[As we watch our neighbours sink ever deeper into nativism we need to be on guard for anything that sucks us into similar madness]]></description>
                <dc:creator>Chris Johns</dc:creator>
                <dc:subject>Economy</dc:subject>
                <guid isPermaLink="false">1.3396459</guid>
                <pubDate>Sun, 18 Feb 2018 11:22:27 +0000</pubDate>
                                                                                                                        
                                                                                        <media:content url="https://www.irishtimes.com/polopoly_fs/1.3396458.1518967723!/image/image.jpg_gen/derivatives/landscape_940/image.jpg" medium="image" type="image/jpeg">
                            <media:title>Leo Varadkar and Justin Trudeau. “If there are lessons from other countries I would take a glance at Canada. Another country where inequality is relatively low and where immigrants are welcomed with open arms.”</media:title>
                        </media:content>
                                                                                </item>

            <item>
                <title><![CDATA[Fintan O’Toole: No integration please, we’re Irish]]></title>

            <item>
                <title><![CDATA[Husband of murdered MP Jo Cox quits charity roles over ‘inappropriate’ behaviour]]></title>
